website_summaries.verdict: Made from 100% hypoallergenic silicone, these nipple covers are ideal for those with sensitive skin.
pros: Manufacturer claims can be used up to 60 times
We like that they're self-adhesive and easy to use
Thin and lightweight, with matte finish for effective concealment
Free return on some sizes and colors
cons: Covers are too thick and therefore noticeable under clothes

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: It covers the nipple but gives your breast a weird look that is not appealing to the eye. You definitely can tell you have something kinda bulky over the nipple.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie W

customer_reviews.title: Work better than I expected - no one sees my "brights"
customer_reviews.text: Work better than I expected - no one sees my "brights". Directions say don't wear longer than 8 hours which is a little difficult to comply with when I am wearing them during the working day. Have worn them a half-dozen times and will be interested to see if I get "100" wearings out of them. They are a necessary item with today's thin tops. If I get the expected # of wearings, I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Summitt

customer_reviews.title: Works well.. Use a 3.5" CD to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: The surface of these are silky making it easy to wear under clothing. The tacky is perfect and really holds on until you want to peel them off. I used a small 3.5 CD i had laying around (computer hardware companies sometimes include drivers or software on them / Wii sized disc) to adhere them on each side of the CD when not in use. Keeps them clean and they fit within the small cd's circumference. Maybe they should include somehting of a plastic disc for future products, ladies can cary them in their purse with no effort at all.
customer_reviews.author: Hatzo Boys

customer_reviews.title: No nip slip nonsense
customer_reviews.text: Love these sticky sidekicks. Did NOT give any support BUT it did cover the girls in cold weather with a tight off shoulder dress on. On a side note, you can reuse these a TON but you may feel like you might loose a nip or two the first few times you try it. Not recommended for sensitive people. But if you are tough as nails and need to not have a nip slip then you’ve come to the right place.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love these things
customer_reviews.text: Love these things! I bought these because when I was wearing a thinner bra at work, everyone could tell when I was cold (if you know what I mean). So I thought I'd give them a try. I've had them for about 2 weeks, and have worn them every day. They're still sticky and I don't have issues with them coming off. The only "bad" thing I have to say is that sometimes if it's warm and I start to sweat they get a little itchy, but still stay on. You can't see them through the shirt or anything. Hopefully these will last for awhile, but after they wear I will definitely be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory B

customer_reviews.title: I went with the “sticky boobs” instead which is more bra like and doesn’t give you the unnatural shape or disgusting ...
customer_reviews.text: Not really a fan of these- make my nipples look large and puffy. Most likely won’t use these or buy again. I went with the “sticky boobs” instead which is more bra like and doesn’t give you the unnatural shape or disgusting nipple outlines when trying to hide them.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Best product I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I like to go without a bra and when I use the Pinky Petals there is no nipple show. I wear them under a thin tank top when I go to Yoga and with all the bending and stretching they are still there no nipple show and still firmly attached. Don't know if this is a gong but you have to pull them off so there is a little pressure. Personally I don't care because I can wear all my tank tops braless. Going on a cruise later in the year and definitely taking them maybe even for the evening if something is strapless. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Linnygirl

customer_reviews.title: Just bought my second set
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The adhesive is great, but doesn't hurt when I take them off. I have worn these for 12 hours straight and been able to use several times after that. I bought these because I got a new dress that had a low back that made a strapless bra not an option. So I was looking for an alternative and thought I'd try them out. They have changed everything, because instead of wearing a strapless bra, now, I wear these if at all possible and don't spend any time having to "readjust" things. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. Can't wear them with anything form fitting whatsoever. Makes you look like you just have a really big nipple. It only hides the "headlights", but creates a whole other problem. You can see the outline of them like an awful panty line. DONT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, long lasting, modest
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these. I used my first pretty regularly under T-shirt’s and swimsuits for 2.5 years and they worked great! I probably could have used them longer, but the adhesive started peeling on the edges (but after so many times using i didn’t care!) and I thought I should get a new pair. They’re easy to clean and I stored them in the plastic they came in or sticky side to sticky side. Definitely recommend for anyone looking to be a bit more modest.
customer_reviews.author: zach devore

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't reuse them
customer_reviews.text: I want to start by saying, the first time I wore these they were amazing! They didn't slip or fall off, they stayed in place all day! I was so excited! However, after cleaning them as the instructions said, I went to use them again and the adhesive was pretty much gone so they kept falling off. These were great the first time, but I wouldn't pay this much for pasties I could only wear once.
customer_reviews.author: N. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, comfortable, convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go under a bra top for belly dance performance. I was paranoid about popping out of my top, and wanted extra coverage. These are durable and easy to put on. I have LOTS of adhesive/skin allergies and these didn't irritate me at all after extended wear. They stayed on, even through all the dancing and sweating. The entire package is convenient to put in a bag on the go, to easily store them when not in use. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Ann

customer_reviews.title: Wardrobe malfunction
customer_reviews.text: These worked great at first- and the I t got hot!! These suckers super off and basically fell off about an hour later. I basically struggled with these jerks for my whole baby shower!! I ended throwing them away as soon as the party was over!!!!! I seriously recommend buying petals instead!!! I had never felt so anxious that these puppies were going to come off!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea V.

customer_reviews.title: Great Nipple Covers for those times you don't want to wear a bra or want the bra to be visible!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 9 year old daughter who is just starting to develop but needs something to wear under her shirts. These provide full coverage for her, are invisible under clothes, and are comfortable. I wear a different brand that's a little better quality when I don't want to wear a bra or a bra would be visible with certain tops. She loves them and it gives her appropriate coverage until she's ready for an actual bra. They are very durable, easily cleaned and retain their adhesiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I've worn them twice in 1 month. And my nipple(s) become irritated the next day after removing it. It's like a dull nagging pain. It makes me wonder if it's even worth it? It's totally visible with some shirts. And when I remove it, I can see sweat on the patties. The adhesive is great. I wonder if the pain is from my sweat ducts being blocked?
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect covers
customer_reviews.text: I don't always need a bra but I always need nipple covers. I can wear these with bralettes as well. Especially great for wearing with tshirts, sweaters, off the shoulder tops and dresses. They are durable and comfortable. Sometimes I forget they are on when I undress, and so far my partner has not seen them, but I fear one day my secret will be met with a fearful jaw-dropped shocking moment.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed in them!
customer_reviews.text: These are uncomfortable to wear, remove, and are a bit difficult to clean. The covers need to air dry so I’m not happy that don’t offer more than one pair and the case is a bit flimsy. The covers do show through your clothes so need to wear tank tops to cover them.
customer_reviews.author: Tegan Richardson

customer_reviews.title: sticky stick stick
customer_reviews.text: good coverage and super extra sticky (but doesn't hurt when you take them off) i have a flowy gold top that doesn't look good when worn with a bra. but if i wear nothing underneath it, two very apparent "dots" become terribly very EXTREMELY tremendously noticeable. i've only used it twice and no complaints so far. the first time, i wore with above mentioned flowy gold top and these babies held on tight as i danced the night away. i hope they'll hold up in the long haul. i bought these for $12.99 (which is totally worth it) but it looks like they've gone down to $9.99 now, which is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: I C Y

customer_reviews.title: she says they are comfortable. They are undetectable under the tee shirts and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my well developed young granddaughter, she says they are comfortable. They are undetectable under the tee shirts and polyester stretch shirts she wears. No more embarrassing personal expression moments! She is very happy with the product and says they are so comfortable she forgets she is wearing them under her sports bras. I will be buying her more! Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: GrammieB

customer_reviews.title: Strapless bras are horrible, go without with these if you want
customer_reviews.text: I can wear any bra with any type of shirt, lace thin bra and tight shirt, not a problem with these handy deals. Braless, no problem, Strapless bras are horrible, go without with these if you want! I love them, use them three, four or even more times a week. Don't even know they are there. Love, love, love them and can kick myself for not discovering them sooner. Going to be great this summer with a padless swim suit. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Jerilyn

customer_reviews.title: Edges showed through
customer_reviews.text: These things seemed like the adhesive would work well, but unfortunately the outline of these showed through a semi-fitted, dress (which had 2 layers). Returned. They might not show under something which is tighter, and they'd be fine under something very loose and flowy, but not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: So Pasties...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for trying on wedding dresses with the potential of maybe wearing them on the wedding day as well, they work better than I thought, and are more comfortable than I imagined. My only issue is I'm a bit of a sweaty person and when I take these off, sweat collects in them a bit. Gross I know but I sanitize them and cleaned them after use, and was able to use them again for more dress fittings. I worry about how they may hold up to a whole days wear particularly if its a hot one... but I can't complain that they have performed well so far
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Very noticeable thick circle can be seen when wearing these.
customer_reviews.text: These are thick silicone covers. They can definitely be seen through your shirt. I don't know what's worse, having your nipples showing when wearing a thin bra or using these things and having a big giant thick circle on the front of your boobs. The adhesive that is used on these are excellent. They don't slip at all and stay on after many uses.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: I had a pair of the nippies skin nipple shields ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of the nippies skin nipple shields previously and ended up loosing one of them. I thought I was ordering the same thing again but let me tell you, I noticed an immediate difference. These leave a very noticeable ring on your shirt showing the entire outline. I immediately ordered a replacement pair of nippies skin's. All nipple shields are not the same. Pay the extra amount and get the quality ones.
customer_reviews.author: Denver

customer_reviews.title: Nice nipple covers
customer_reviews.text: These are relatively a nice product and they do stick on natural breasts that are a size C cup. The problem with my nipples is they still stick out a bit with these. Don't get me wrong not as bad, but they still do. They're comfortable and easy to put on. I do not know how many times I can wear them yet, because I've only put them on once.
customer_reviews.author: RBJ

customer_reviews.title: ... just how it should- stays on perfectly & I love that these don't have the weird kind of extra ...
customer_reviews.text: One of them works just how it should- stays on perfectly & I love that these don't have the weird kind of extra material that leaves a line around it & creates a whole new problem. The other one has little to no stickiness on it. While one stays on all day, I'm lucky to get the other to stay on more than five minutes. If it had been a consistent pair & they were both sticky I would definitely rate five stars! But if it hadn't been for the one that's actually sticky it would have been one star.
customer_reviews.author: J. carter

customer_reviews.title: These pasties are easy to put on and take off and haven't lost ...
customer_reviews.text: These pasties are easy to put on and take off and haven't lost their stickiness after a couple of uses, but I'm curious to see how long they really last. I was comfortable wearing them, and my nipples weren't visible through my shirt. Because of the thickness of the pasties, however, from certain angles you could see the slight outline of them when wearing a thin t-shirt. Overall though, I couldn't really expect more and I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: I hate wearing bras, so I decided to get some nipple pasties.. this are the first and only that I have bought. They're sticky enough so I know they'll hold, but easy to pull off. I've had them for a week (wearing every day) and I can see them lasting a while. The edges are starting to lose their stickiness but that's because I haven't washed them yet. Only downside is you need to wear a second shirt (I wear a thin tank top) because you can kind of see a weird bump. But totally worth it to not have to wear an uncomfortable bra!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: This is for one set of two. Not four as the photo implies.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why there are 4 of them in the advertising photo, because you get two. That said, they work for what they're needed for. That's about the best I can say. The picture was very misleading so it lost starts for dishonesty.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Morgan

customer_reviews.title: OMG I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. I am a tiny (barely an A) in cup size and don't need to wear bras anymore. But I HATE having my nipples show. These are completely hidden under my dresses, and are so comfortable I forget they are even on. The color is OK (I am very pale). I haven't tried them with white yet but when I do I will update my review. The backings on these feel like cling-wrap and stretched when I pulled the backing off to adhere so they are hard to get the exact ones back on but seran-wrap does the trick. I wish I got these a lot sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: Reliable product I will always go back to.
customer_reviews.text: I am on my third pair now and I will continue to buy this brand. It is an amazing product that feels very comfortable and easily sticks onto your skin. I would say that the lifespan is approximately 30 days and I wear mine pretty often. It can be slightly seen through some thinner materials and sheer items but it doesn't really bother me. Fantastic for backless dresses, tank tops, anything really and I feel like it does improve circulation and perkiness since I haven't been wearing a bra as much.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Totally necessary!
customer_reviews.text: I used these almost every day this summer because I love flowy/strappy/backless tanks and dresses. They stay on really well but are easy to remove at the end of the day and easy to clean. They don't create visible lines under clothes and are really comfortable for me. After a summer of basically constant use, they finally started to be a bit less sticky so I reordered a new pair, but I definitely feel I got more than my money's worth out of the first pair.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: This product claims to have a tapered edge but after a couple wears the edges curl up so even if they still stick you can see a clear circle through your clothing. I like the fact that they're reusable but after a couple uses one fell out my dress during a bridal shower lol! I'll stick with the disposable stickers, they work much better and stay put 100%
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Explain this to grandma
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I bought them at first for my mom so I don't embarrass HDR. Lol I she said that every woman should wear of raw, myself and my doctor disagree. So I had to explain to her that everybody has nipples. I don't think that conversation went as well as I wanted. Anyway this product is fabulous, great coverage and I love the fact that they're reusable and stay in place
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR ALL DAY USE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product thinking I could wear all day under a bra that needed extra coverage. When I read the back it says that you shouldn't wear for more than 8 hours. I think most of us wear bras for longer than that and didn't want to cause irritation so this product is useless to me. I didn't even try them and they are not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Small boobs beware!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in the hopes that I could wear them with some of my new tank tops. They were great; you couldn't see them at all. HOWEVER, within twenty minutes of wear (after taking them out of the box for the very first time), they were already starting to fall off. I have very small, conically-shaped breasts with slightly-larger-than-average nipples. While the adhesives covered my whole nipple with room to spare, they started to peel away at all sides, and although they haven't fallen off yet, they seem like they're on the verge of doing so. I don't feel safe wearing them out of the house even once. I'm very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these. I had never tried any pasties/nipple covers ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. I had never tried any pasties/nipple covers and now I am hooked! I hate wearing a bra and always struggled as I love low cut/backless clothing items. These are my new favorite thing. I have worn them probably 30-40 times and they still stick, but not as much as the first few uses (the edges lift a little). I have already reorder for when they stop working! The color and size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SJSO

customer_reviews.title: Stayed on no issue all night
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised -- I'm a warmer person and tend to sweat -- especially when dancing or in crowded spaces. I wore these to a wedding and they lasted all night. At the end of the night when taking them off, they were still solidly stuck on. I think I can get 2-3 more uses out of them. When the stickiness wears off, I'll definitely be purchasing these again!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: Best nipple covers
customer_reviews.text: They are extremely sticky, I used them twice so far and they still feel as sticky as the 1st time. They don’t budge at all while you are wearing them so you don’t have to readjust or feel worried about them coming loose. Amazingly comfortable and you can’t see them through thin clothing. Feel the security of being covered with the weightless feeling of no bra. Removed painlessly after several hours each usage. Worked in high humidity/heat causing a lot of sweating.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen O'Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Hope this is useful.
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this product by mistake, but I kept it anyway (needed right away). I must say they work well. They really stick to you even when you sweat. I resued them the whole weekend and they are still reusable 2 weeks later. I made sure to put the plastic back on when I took them off. I am a size 34/D. Hope this is useful.
customer_reviews.author: Mother May I, yes you may

customer_reviews.title: Work perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These work perfect! Cover nicely and come off clean and easy. Have worn over 6 times and they still stick perfectly. Put them up after each use onto the plastic sheet again as instructed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont like them
customer_reviews.text: Super sticky so that's good, color is good, but on the down side they're so thick they make u look weird like puffy nips. My other silicone covers work so well I was so bummed these 1s didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Kris💋

customer_reviews.title: A little thick
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage but a bit thick. Doesnt sit as flat as other brands and makes the nipple area appear unusually thick. But maybe its because I'm petite all around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100% trust 100% customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.text: I am so surprised as to how long-wearing these are. They last through a whole night of dancing. They obviously do not give any support and I consider myself "bigger-breasted" so if you have a bigger chest I only recommend these under a tight-fitting dress. The pasties are fantastic and give full coverage. They can be rinsed off under water and dried with a clean towel for reuse. My trust is in this product 100% no matter the occasion. (This product is perfect for smaller chested ladies, less recommended the bigger your cup size gets after Ds.)
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: Practical and useful
customer_reviews.text: Work fine. I try not to use too often because I’m not sure what the adhesive is made with. Don’t like leaving that on my skin. But when I do use, works fine, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: These are okay, but I wish they were "flatter" and maybe a bit larger. They show behind some fabrics because they are made of the soft, padded material and stick out. It's hard to explain I guess, but they are somewhat "puffy." They don't minimize the entire nipple. They lose their stick after several wears. They will sweat off if it's really hot. Easy to wash, but I wish they were a bit more resilient!
customer_reviews.author: ECKERTS

customer_reviews.title: Did not "blend"
customer_reviews.text: Adhesion was great, however, the shape/tapering just did not blend with my boobs for a natural look. I'm a 34B and wanted these so I could ditch bras, but it looked awkward under shirts. Made just a large lump in place of headlights :(
customer_reviews.author: ShellBell

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage and stay in place!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They go on easy and stay on! When you take them off, you rinse them and put them back in the holder and they are as good as new the next time you use them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LORI A. ROGERS

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Don’t expect to use it multiple times. Stickiness wears off immediately. I had a much better brand before I just can’t find them. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Bella9505

customer_reviews.title: nice but edges lost stick
customer_reviews.text: These say that they can be used up to 100 times although I had the issue where the edges collected fuzzes and lost stickiness. I tried cleaning it as the instructions indicated but did not see much improvement. They do work very well for multiple uses but I think that they work better with more tight fitting clothing that cannot rub on the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Beatrix

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: These are great and just as expected! They do not irritate my extremely sensitive skin. I wear these instead of bras do to chronic illnesses and they make a world of difference when you're always cold! Ha!
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stays on!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these a little over 10 times now, and they still stay on. They are comfortable and easy to clean. I purchased them because I was having my entire back tattooed and couldn't wear a bra (in my session) or to work for several days. These were great for the job!
customer_reviews.author: Evadere

customer_reviews.title: The pasties arent flush with skin and show through the clothes, so looks like I have a deformed breast.
customer_reviews.text: These petals cover the nipple however when I put it on under a dress, you can see the silicone edge that is large and protruding now flush with the breast. So I dont have my nipple showing, but you see a bump that thats like I have this weird boob growing out of my boob. Therefore, I havent gone out in public wearing it, disapointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the clothing that have no straps or you need to wear that little something under. Easy to clean and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Hockeymom

customer_reviews.title: The covers are not opaque enough so I cannot wear ...
customer_reviews.text: The covers are not opaque enough so I cannot wear these with any white shirt/dress. Also, they began to peel after just one day's use. Disappointing. A different brand I use before these lasted me a long time and I could wear them with any article of clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Anie Jamgochian

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy them again!
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great value. The pasties cover the entire nipple area and stay in place. They are comfortable and definately reusable as they claim. I've worn them at least 4 times and they are holding up well. Follow the manufacturers instructions for use & care. My only caution is that I was unable to wear them with a thin white sweater because the pasties were too dark of a flesh color and you were able to see them through the white cotton sweater. Otherwise, you can wear them with just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: It's always sunny!

customer_reviews.title: These are great to use when you don't want your bra straps ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great to use when you don't want your bra straps showing. However, I made the mistake of wearing these during a humid day and they kept falling off. Do not wear these if it's humid or if there's a chance you might be sweating at all, I would also suggest skipping the lotion before putting them on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In stead of a bra...
customer_reviews.text: Finally!! I am 57 and do not like wearing bras. I never have, thus the problem of coverage with out a bra. I just wear dark clothes. FREEDOM! Back in "the day" one could not get pasties with out tassels, if you know what I mean. These cover perfectly! I saw a review that said they did not stick well and hurt when removed....NOT THE CASE! I have worn them twice so far and feel confident & comfortable. I wondered as well, if the more expensive "customer favorite" would be better, but, never wearing these before, I went with the inexpensive pasties. I will be buying more...eventually they have to wear out, but, for now I am wearing white!!!
customer_reviews.author: marywho

customer_reviews.title: Not for the big girls
customer_reviews.text: I am a fairly large breasted woman who works in a freezing office daily. Rather than have my headlights turned on all day, I wanted to be able to walk through the office and meet with co-works without my nipples poking through my shirts, and feel a little more comfortable with my breasts. I ordered these will great anticipation of pure nipple coverage, only to reveal they make me look like I have bologna nipples. I do not recommend this for large breasted woman whose shirts are tightly fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Tardicuss

customer_reviews.title: Love these pasties
customer_reviews.text: Love these pasties. I wear them under my bodysuits and other tops where bras don't work and they work so well! I've used mine about 5 times now and stick them right back on the plastic packaging it comes with and they are still in good shape. I've even worn them to a couple music festivals for 10+ hours and have never had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jenessa Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Too obvious
customer_reviews.text: These covers adhere to the skin quite well, but for me were too thick and it made it really obvious that I was wearing them. They were also a lot darker than I expected which only added to their visibility. I think these looked worse than simply going without. Maybe they would be play with a thicker shirt or sweater but I think that kind of defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Harden

customer_reviews.title: They’re not as easy to clean as the description says but overall I’m ...
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these many times in the past few weeks and I have had no issues with them sticking on. They’re not as easy to clean as the description says but overall I’m extremely happy for the money and I will definitely be purchasing another pair when this one is ready to be thrown away!
customer_reviews.author: Kokayjam

customer_reviews.title: Thick, show through tight shirts.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get these, but they were not as I had hoped. They are much thicker than I thought they would be, so they can be seen through a tight fittting shirt and make it look like you have huge, oddly shaped nipples or something. They might work with something that is loose fitting. But I cant weat them with a cami, which was my hope. Oh well!
customer_reviews.author: JBullie

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Stick n all day
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Stick n all day. Be sure to take care of them and clean after use as well. They will last a long time. The size could be a little larger so when wearing them, the pastors can have a smooth and uniform transition on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kahuna101

customer_reviews.title: They stick so well!!
customer_reviews.text: I used them under a swimsuit in the middle of June in Florida. It was soooooooooo hot and humid. Yet, they stayed in place!
customer_reviews.author: SarahN

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many pairs of silicone covers and these are up there with the best of them. They're extremely sticky,never fall off and leave absolutely no show of the cover. Alot of my going out outfits require me to wear these and it's nice they can be re used and still stay on nicely. These are a great price and once my current pair are done Ill definitely get these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works  pretty well worth the try.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Except for the airport check in the machine were the air blows up! Yup kill me I lost one. And no I did not absolutely go look for it. Rinse off, completely dry and put back in original package. Do not use lotion and if you tend to sweat or it’s humid out you might lose one.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and works great. I’ve ordered a few times as they do wear down after a while and the edges become a little dark from touching fabrics and wear/tear. I typically wear these under dresses and certain tank tops where I don’t want to have the bra showing.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Do not stick well
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. They do not stick well at all even with the first use they are barely staying on. Will never get these again. Get Hollywood Fashion Silicone Cover Ups Reusable Nipple Concealers, they are much better.
customer_reviews.author: J. Richmond

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I used them for the first time recently and I was surpised by how well they stuck for HOURS and how comfortable they were. Hopefully they last for a while until the stickiness is gone after multiple uses. I will update my review then.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Worked but they are bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: They did their job of hiding my nipples but I felt the pasties themselves were a little on the large side. I am guessing this is so they have more breast skin, instead of nipple skin to grab onto. But I almost could see the outline of the pasties themselves and hoped no one would think my nipples were that big! Think bigger than a quarter dollar. So I guess I wish they made these in different sizes. But they did do their job which is the point.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Rodrigue

customer_reviews.title: the adhesive quality is still good! I just recommend washing them after every use ...
customer_reviews.text: Used them about 6 times so far, the adhesive quality is still good! I just recommend washing them after every use by rinsing or wiping it with a gentle cloth to ensure body oils don't build up and degrade the adhesive or make it gross.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Read the directions
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how well these worked. I wore it with a strapless dress and another time with a nice shirt and forgot they were there. It is recommended to only wear it for 8 hours and I agree. I tried wearing mine for a day to see what would happen. The adhesive started to come off and I found myself worried about them falling off after the 10 hour mark.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla K.

customer_reviews.title: Visible if you don't wear a padded bra
customer_reviews.text: You can see the outline of these through any non-padded bra, which essentially defeats the purpose of having them on to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The worst petals I’ve ever bought you can see them clear through your shirts
customer_reviews.author: genice

customer_reviews.title: Product is too large
customer_reviews.text: Product is too large. It actually extentuates my nipples through my blouses/shirts and makes me more noticeable. I won't be using them.

customer_reviews.title: I have large breasts (DD) and did not like the way these pasties stuck on me
customer_reviews.text: I have large breasts (DD) and did not like the way these pasties stuck on me. They sat on top of the breast but there was a noticable shape of where it was. I think it would work better on smaller breasts.
customer_reviews.author: Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great for going brawless in summer tops
customer_reviews.text: Great for going brawless in summer tops. 2nd set - I loved wearing them last year. After a year's wear they were no longer sticky enough.
customer_reviews.author: autumn

customer_reviews.title: These work perfectly if you're just trying to hide your ...
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly if you're just trying to hide your nips from poking out in thinner shirts. They will NOT work for very sheer tops, you will be able to see the circles underneath your clothing. I've used them two or three times now and they're sticky enough that I'm not worried about them falling off. Not entirely sure how long these will last. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: kairynel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected and adhered very well. These will work great for backless tops/dresses, and for any other clothing where finding the right bra can be difficult. I did not notice a "line" between my skin and the pasties, however, this may depend on bust size - everyone is different!
customer_reviews.author: Eva Gray

customer_reviews.title: A must-have product!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I don't wear a bra so I found this product in hopes of being able to wear thin and white shirts comfortably. They do exactly as pledged and remain sticky after caring for them as the box states. My closet is now with endless possibilities! I will purchase them again and again. Thanks, Pinky Petals!
customer_reviews.author: ThestralIce22

customer_reviews.title: You can see them through shirts 👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good with the sticking but they’re pretty thick so most the time you can see them through shirts. I’ve tried other brands and never experienced that with them

customer_reviews.title: Every woman needs these
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable that I forget they are there. Have even worn them during a sweaty exercise class. Wishing I would have know about these years ago

I even tried testing them with soap and NOP they wouldn't come off!!!!! Gotta admit i love these and the best park is, they are reusable!!!!!

customer_reviews.text: I have small boobs and I don't need a bra but some tops are too thin and this a great alternative to a bra

customer_reviews.title: These are seriously so great if you are looking for "sticky-boobs"/ nipple petals
customer_reviews.text: These are seriously so great if you are looking for "sticky-boobs"/ nipple petals. I have worn them about 8-10 times now and they are still sticky. They are a little dirty on the very edge and are beginning to lose stickiness, but overall a pretty great product. I have worn tight shirts, backless, deep cut, etc... and you cannot tell they are on- no outline- which is great.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite most comfortable bra unfortunately has no padding in its ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite most comfortable bra unfortunately has no padding in its cups, so nipples are VERY obvious, (which is NOT the look I'm going for). This product is the perfect solution to that problem. They are easy to use, comfortable and effective. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great cover up, ouchy removal
customer_reviews.text: These do an excellent job of covering my nipples when I wear lighter colors without a bra. Love them! They are super sticky, so the only part I don't like about them is when I take them off. Ouch!! Take em off slowly ladies!
customer_reviews.author: Lona

customer_reviews.title: Great option for a braless dress/top
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, covered my entire nipple, held their stickiness for two wears, and didn’t show very much at all through my dresses. I was hoping for a few more wears out of them but I also wore them in the hot heat of Cali summer so I’m not too disappointed that I got only two wears. I’d order again
customer_reviews.author: heylyss

customer_reviews.title: These pasties arrived quickly and are of good quality, but they are too thick
customer_reviews.text: These pasties arrived quickly and are of good quality, but they are too thick. They create a weird bump under your clothes, making them look obvious. The point of these pasties is to conceal, and this just makes it more obvious that you are wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had great hopes for these things
customer_reviews.text: I had great hopes for these things. 30 years ago, pointing the direction I wanted to go might have been considered sexy; now, not so much. Pinky Petals does cover the nipple, but it leaves a very obvious circular indentation so that instead of "Look at that old woman with the big nipples" it's more like "Look at that old woman trying to hide her big nipples." I'll go back to the disposables - they're more expensive in the long run, but they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend this brand
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I needed. They could be easier to store after you use them, rather than right back in the plastic strips and packaging, but they worked perfectly, even when I was out dancing and working up a light sweat! I do recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: aegreve

customer_reviews.title: My sister loves these.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sister after we'd been bra shopping for hours. She tried them and said they are exactly what she needed under some of her clothes where she " sticks out" too noticably.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Really neat as I live in the tropical & moist ...
customer_reviews.text: Really neat as I live in the tropical & moist air of Fkorid where if your skin can't breath with certain fabrics you get a skin fungus. Now I wear these Pinkies all the time in the heat and no one suspects I'm not wearing a bra. I havnt had any issues with my skin since I discover the Pinkies. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it stays on and doesn't hurt upon removal.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They stayed on the entire night which included sweating, cold weather, and rain. The edges kind of pop up a little but i think I just have to press them down more firmly. I was in a rush at the time. But I intend to use these on a regular basis I'm transitioning to this liberating no-bra lifestyle. May buy more of these.

customer_reviews.title: I AM HAPPY with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my FIRST experience with pasties. I AM FREE! I will be going braless a lot more often thanks to this product. It functioned as described. Now, yesterday was my first time using them. They are supposed to be "reusable." I will let you know if my review stays the same after a few uses. But for now, I AM HAPPY with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CCB

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect and the adhesive lasted all day and night. These things were able to tame some nice pokey nips with ease. I would highly recommend these to others and would buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: robert paulsen

customer_reviews.title: Not for t shirts or tank tops
customer_reviews.text: These are horrible. I bought them intending to wear them under tank tops, but you can see them clearly even under a regular loose fitting t shirt. I wish I had my money back to invest in a nicer pair. I guess you really get what you pay for with these things...
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Brandenburg

customer_reviews.title: Purchased a body shaper garment and it did not have ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a body shaper garment and it did not have padding in the cups...this product made everything work perfectly and I did not have to send the shaper back. I can also reuse them so I will be able to wear them under t-shirts and other thinner materials....
customer_reviews.author: J Summers

customer_reviews.title: cannot wear under very fitted dresses; can see the ...
customer_reviews.text: cannot wear under very fitted dresses; can see the outline. can also see through pale clothing. i have a tight, light pink dress and can plainly make out the outline. i can wear under more loosely fitted clothing and they do stay in place for as long as you need
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
